remarks: Define the set of subspaces of a Hilbert space.  See ~ issh for its membership relation.  Basically, a subspace is a subset of a Hilbert space that acts like a vector space.  From Definition of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: df-sh $p |- SH = { h e. ~P ~H | ( 0h e. h /\ ( +h " ( h X. h ) ) C_ h /\ ( .h " ( CC X. h ) ) C_ h ) } $.
